snippet.title: Arcade Mode (Rushdown Rivals Reloaded - Update Available Now!)
snippet.description:
PLAY FOR FREE NOW
Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/883362
Itch.io: https://spagato.itch.io/rushdown-reloaded

A new update for the Pico Day 2023 Winning Rushdown Rivals arcade shooter spin off! An endlessly looping arcade mode where you can properly compete for the leaderboards! Delve into the twisting turning arenas of Nevada facing a new batch of robot reinforcements. 

Take on the robot hordes of Rushdown Rivals from a different perspective! Fight through the city streets in this hectic arcade shooter inspired by Time Crisis and House of the Dead!

==============================================================================
This is a FAN-MADE game. All characters depicted belong to their respective creators.

CREDITS

KEITH GARCES - Director / Animation
SPAGATO - Director / Sound
DIESWYX - Music
BARYISCOOL - Arcade Music

#free #games #gameplay #trailer #indiegame #picoday  #pico #newgrounds #launchtrailer #freegame #flash #flashgame #action #arcade #shooter #fps #robot #madness #combat
